kv2.2:1.3.pli: Atthi arahato avijjā avijjogho avijjāyogo avijjānusayo avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ avijjānīvaraṇanti?

kv2.2:1.5.pli: Natthi arahato avijjā avijjogho avijjāyogo avijjānusayo avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ avijjānīvaraṇanti?

kv2.2:1.7.pli: Hañci natthi arahato avijjā avijjogho avijjāyogo avijjānusayo avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ avijjānīvaraṇaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv2.2:2.1.pli: Atthi puthujjanassa aññāṇaṃ, atthi tassa avijjā avijjogho avijjāyogo avijjānusayo avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ avijjānīvaraṇanti?

kv2.2:2.3.pli: Atthi arahato aññāṇaṃ, atthi tassa avijjā avijjogho avijjāyogo avijjānusayo avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ avijjānīvaraṇanti?

kv2.2:3.1.pli: Atthi arahato aññāṇaṃ, natthi tassa avijjā avijjogho avijjāyogo avijjānusayo avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ avijjānīvaraṇanti?

kv2.2:3.3.pli: Atthi puthujjanassa aññāṇaṃ, natthi tassa avijjā avijjogho avijjāyogo avijjānusayo avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ avijjānīvaraṇanti?

kv2.2:4.3.pli: Arahā aññāṇapakato pāṇaṃ haneyya, adinnaṃ ādiyeyya, musā bhaṇeyya, pisuṇaṃ bhaṇeyya, pharusaṃ bhaṇeyya, samphaṃ palapeyya, sandhiṃ chindeyya, nillopaṃ hareyya, ekāgāriyaṃ kareyya, paripanthe tiṭṭheyya, paradāraṃ gaccheyya, gāmaghātaṃ kareyya, nigamaghātaṃ kareyyāti?

kv2.2:5.1.pli: Atthi puthujjanassa aññāṇaṃ, puthujjano aññāṇapakato pāṇaṃ haneyya, adinnaṃ ādiyeyya, musā bhaṇeyya …pe… gāmaghātaṃ kareyya, nigamaghātaṃ kareyyāti?

kv2.2:5.3.pli: Atthi arahato aññāṇaṃ, arahā aññāṇapakato pāṇaṃ haneyya, adinnaṃ ādiyeyya …pe… gāmaghātaṃ kareyya, nigamaghātaṃ kareyyāti?

kv2.2:6.1.pli: Atthi arahato aññāṇaṃ, na ca arahā aññāṇapakato pāṇaṃ haneyya, adinnaṃ ādiyeyya …pe… gāmaghātaṃ kareyya, nigamaghātaṃ kareyyāti?

kv2.2:6.3.pli: Atthi puthujjanassa aññāṇaṃ, na ca puthujjano aññāṇapakato pāṇaṃ haneyya, adinnaṃ ādiyeyya …pe… gāmaghātaṃ kareyya, nigamaghātaṃ kareyyāti?

kv2.2:7.3.pli: Atthi arahato satthari aññāṇaṃ, dhamme aññāṇaṃ, saṅghe aññāṇaṃ, sikkhāya aññāṇaṃ, pubbante aññāṇaṃ, aparante aññāṇaṃ, pubbantāparante aññāṇaṃ, idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu aññāṇanti?

kv2.2:8.1.pli: Natthi arahato satthari aññāṇaṃ, dhamme aññāṇaṃ, saṅghe aññāṇaṃ, sikkhāya aññāṇaṃ, pubbante aññāṇaṃ, aparante aññāṇaṃ, pubbantāparante aññāṇaṃ, idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu aññāṇanti?

kv2.2:8.3.pli: Hañci natthi arahato satthari aññāṇaṃ, dhamme aññāṇaṃ, saṅghe aññāṇaṃ …pe… idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu aññāṇaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv2.2:9.1.pli: Atthi puthujjanassa aññāṇaṃ, atthi tassa satthari aññāṇaṃ, dhamme aññāṇaṃ, saṅghe aññāṇaṃ …pe… idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu aññāṇanti?

kv2.2:9.3.pli: Atthi arahato aññāṇaṃ, atthi tassa satthari aññāṇaṃ, dhamme aññāṇaṃ, saṅghe aññāṇaṃ …pe… idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu aññāṇanti?

kv2.2:10.1.pli: Atthi arahato aññāṇaṃ, natthi tassa satthari aññāṇaṃ, dhamme aññāṇaṃ, saṅghe aññāṇaṃ …pe… idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu aññāṇanti?

kv2.2:10.3.pli: Atthi puthujjanassa aññāṇaṃ, natthi tassa satthari aññāṇaṃ, dhamme aññāṇaṃ, saṅghe aññāṇaṃ …pe… idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu aññāṇanti?

kv2.2:11.3.pli: Nanu arahato rāgo pahīno ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṅkato āyatiṃ anuppādadhammoti?

kv2.2:11.5.pli: Hañci arahato rāgo pahīno ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṅkato āyatiṃ anuppādadhammo, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv2.2:12.5.pli: anottappaṃ pahīnaṃ ucchinnamūlaṃ tālāvatthukataṃ anabhāvaṅkataṃ āyatiṃ anuppādadhammanti?

kv2.2:12.7.pli: Hañci arahato anottappaṃ pahīnaṃ ucchinnamūlaṃ tālāvatthukataṃ anabhāvaṅkataṃ āyatiṃ anuppādadhammaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv2.2:13.6.pli: Hañci arahato rāgappahānāya bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv2.2:14.8.pli: Hañci arahato anottappapahānāya bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv2.2:15.7.pli: sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv2.2:16.2.pli: Sadhammakusalassa arahato atthi aññāṇaṃ, paradhammakusalassa arahato natthi aññāṇanti.

kv2.2:18.1.pli: Sadhammakusalassa arahato rāgo pahīno, atthi tassa aññāṇanti?

kv2.2:18.3.pli: Paradhammakusalassa arahato rāgo pahīno, atthi tassa aññāṇanti?

kv2.2:19.5.pli: Paradhammakusalassa arahato anottappaṃ pahīnaṃ, atthi tassa aññāṇanti?

kv2.2:20.4.pli: Paradhammakusalassa arahato rāgappahānāya bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā, atthi tassa aññāṇanti?

kv2.2:21.6.pli: Paradhammakusalassa arahato anottappapahānāya bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā, atthi tassa aññāṇanti?

kv2.2:23.1.pli: Paradhammakusalassa arahato rāgo pahīno, natthi tassa aññāṇanti?

kv2.2:23.3.pli: Sadhammakusalassa arahato rāgo pahīno, natthi tassa aññāṇanti?

kv2.2:24.5.pli: Sadhammakusalassa arahato anottappaṃ pahīnaṃ, natthi tassa aññāṇanti?

kv2.2:25.7.pli: Sadhammakusalassa arahato anottappapahānāya bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā, natthi tassa aññāṇanti?

kv2.2:27.4.pli: “jānatohaṃ, bhikkhave, passato āsavānaṃ khayaṃ vadāmi, no ajānato no apassato.

kv2.2:27.5.pli: Kiñca, bhikkhave, jānato kiṃ passato āsavānaṃ khayo hoti?

kv2.2:27.6.pli: ‘Iti rūpaṃ, iti rūpassa samudayo, iti rūpassa atthaṅgamo, iti vedanā …pe…

kv2.2:27.9.pli: iti viññāṇaṃ, iti viññāṇassa samudayo, iti viññāṇassa atthaṅgamo’ti—

kv2.2:27.10.pli: evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṃ passato āsavānaṃ khayo hotī”ti.

kv2.2:28.4.pli: “jānatohaṃ, bhikkhave, passato āsavānaṃ khayaṃ vadāmi, no ajānato no apassato.

kv2.2:28.5.pli: Kiñca, bhikkhave, jānato kiṃ passato āsavānaṃ khayo hoti?

kv2.2:28.7.pli: bhikkhave, jānato passato āsavānaṃ khayo hoti, ‘ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo’ti—

kv2.2:28.8.pli: jānato passato āsavānaṃ khayo hoti, ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodho’ti—

kv2.2:28.9.pli: jānato passato āsavānaṃ khayo hoti, ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti—

kv2.2:28.11.pli: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṃ passato āsavānaṃ khayo hotī”ti.

kv2.2:29.4.pli: “sabbaṃ, bhikkhave, anabhijānaṃ aparijānaṃ avirājayaṃ appajahaṃ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāya, sabbañca kho, bhikkhave, abhijānaṃ parijānaṃ virājayaṃ pajahaṃ bhabbo dukkhakkhayāyā”ti.

kv2.2:33.4.pli: “yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasāvakassa virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi—

kv2.2:33.5.pli: ‘yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamman’ti, saha dassanuppādā, bhikkhave, ariyasāvakassa tīṇi saṃyojanāni pahīyanti—

kv2.2:34.4.pli: Nanu arahā itthipurisānaṃ nāmagottaṃ na jāneyya, maggāmaggaṃ na jāneyya, tiṇakaṭṭhavanappatīnaṃ nāmaṃ na jāneyyāti?

kv2.2:34.6.pli: Hañci arahā itthipurisānaṃ nāmagottaṃ na jāneyya, maggāmaggaṃ na jāneyya, tiṇakaṭṭhavanappatīnaṃ nāmaṃ na jāneyya, tena vata re vattabbe—

kv2.2:35.1.pli: Arahā itthipurisānaṃ nāmagottaṃ na jāneyya, maggāmaggaṃ na jāneyya, tiṇakaṭṭhavanappatīnaṃ nāmaṃ na jāneyyāti, atthi arahato aññāṇanti?

kv2.2:35.3.pli: Arahā sotāpattiphalaṃ vā sakadāgāmiphalaṃ vā anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arahattaṃ vā na jāneyyāti?

kv2.3:1.3.pli: Atthi arahato vicikicchā vicikicchāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ vicikicchāsaṃyojanaṃ vicikicchānīvaraṇanti?

kv2.3:2.1.pli: Natthi arahato vicikicchā vicikicchāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ vicikicchāsaṃyojanaṃ vicikicchānīvaraṇanti?

kv2.3:2.3.pli: Hañci natthi arahato vicikicchā vicikicchāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ vicikicchāsaṃyojanaṃ vicikicchānīvaraṇaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv2.3:3.1.pli: Atthi puthujjanassa kaṅkhā, atthi tassa vicikicchā vicikicchāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ vicikicchāsaṃyojanaṃ vicikicchānīvaraṇanti?

kv2.3:3.3.pli: Atthi arahato kaṅkhā, atthi tassa vicikicchā vicikicchāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ vicikicchāsaṃyojanaṃ vicikicchānīvaraṇanti?

kv2.3:4.1.pli: Atthi arahato kaṅkhā, natthi tassa vicikicchā vicikicchāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ vicikicchāsaṃyojanaṃ vicikicchānīvaraṇanti?

kv2.3:4.3.pli: Atthi puthujjanassa kaṅkhā, natthi tassa vicikicchā vicikicchāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ vicikicchāsaṃyojanaṃ vicikicchānīvaraṇanti?

kv2.3:5.3.pli: Atthi arahato satthari kaṅkhā, dhamme kaṅkhā, saṅghe kaṅkhā, sikkhāya kaṅkhā, pubbante kaṅkhā, aparante kaṅkhā, pubbantāparante kaṅkhā, idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu kaṅkhāti?

kv2.3:6.1.pli: Natthi arahato satthari kaṅkhā, dhamme kaṅkhā …pe… idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu kaṅkhāti?

kv2.3:6.3.pli: Hañci natthi arahato satthari kaṅkhā, dhamme kaṅkhā …pe… idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu kaṅkhā, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv2.3:7.1.pli: Atthi puthujjanassa kaṅkhā, atthi tassa satthari kaṅkhā, dhamme kaṅkhā …pe… idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu kaṅkhāti?

kv2.3:7.3.pli: Atthi arahato kaṅkhā, atthi tassa satthari kaṅkhā, dhamme kaṅkhā …pe… idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu kaṅkhāti?

kv2.3:8.1.pli: Atthi arahato kaṅkhā, natthi tassa satthari kaṅkhā, dhamme kaṅkhā …pe… idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu kaṅkhāti?

kv2.3:8.3.pli: Atthi puthujjanassa kaṅkhā, natthi tassa satthari kaṅkhā, dhamme kaṅkhā …pe… idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu kaṅkhāti?

kv2.3:9.3.pli: Nanu arahato rāgo pahīno ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṅkato āyatiṃ anuppādadhammoti?

kv2.3:9.5.pli: Hañci arahato rāgo pahīno ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṅkato āyatiṃ anuppādadhammo, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv2.3:10.15.pli: sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv2.3:11.2.pli: Sadhammakusalassa arahato atthi kaṅkhā, paradhammakusalassa arahato natthi kaṅkhāti.

kv2.3:13.1.pli: Sadhammakusalassa arahato rāgo pahīno, atthi tassa kaṅkhāti?

kv2.3:13.3.pli: Paradhammakusalassa arahato rāgo pahīno, atthi tassa kaṅkhāti?

kv2.3:14.16.pli: paradhammakusalassa arahato rāgo pahīno, natthi tassa kaṅkhāti?

kv2.3:14.18.pli: Sadhammakusalassa arahato rāgo pahīno, natthi tassa kaṅkhāti?

kv2.3:16.4.pli: “jānatohaṃ, bhikkhave, passato āsavānaṃ khayaṃ vadāmi, no ajānato no apassato.

kv2.3:16.5.pli: Kiñca, bhikkhave, jānato kiṃ passato āsavānaṃ khayo hoti?

kv2.3:16.8.pli: evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṃ passato āsavānaṃ khayo hotī”ti.

kv2.3:17.4.pli: “jānatohaṃ, bhikkhave, passato āsavānaṃ khayaṃ vadāmi, no ajānato no apassato.

kv2.3:17.5.pli: Kiñca, bhikkhave, jānato kiṃ passato āsavānaṃ khayo hoti?

kv2.3:17.7.pli: ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti jānato passato āsavānaṃ khayo hoti.

kv2.3:17.8.pli: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṃ passato āsavānaṃ khayo hotī”ti.

kv2.3:18.4.pli: “sabbaṃ, bhikkhave, anabhijānaṃ aparijānaṃ avirājayaṃ appajahaṃ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāya;

kv2.3:18.5.pli: sabbañca kho, bhikkhave, abhijānaṃ parijānaṃ virājayaṃ pajahaṃ bhabbo dukkhakkhayāyā”ti.

kv2.3:20.4.pli: “yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasāvakassa virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi—

kv2.3:20.5.pli: ‘yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamman’ti, saha dassanuppādā, bhikkhave, ariyasāvakassa tīṇi saṃyojanāni pahīyanti—

kv2.3:25.1.pli: Yā kāci kaṅkhā idha vā huraṃ vā,

kv2.3:27.2.pli: Na tattha kiṃ kaṅkhati koci sāvako;

kv2.3:29.4.pli: Nanu arahā itthipurisānaṃ nāmagotte kaṅkheyya, maggāmagge kaṅkheyya, tiṇakaṭṭhavanappatīnaṃ nāme kaṅkheyyāti?

kv2.3:29.6.pli: Hañci arahā itthipurisānaṃ nāmagotte kaṅkheyya, maggāmagge kaṅkheyya, tiṇakaṭṭhavanappatīnaṃ nāme kaṅkheyya;

kv2.3:30.1.pli: Arahā itthipurisānaṃ nāmagotte kaṅkheyya, maggāmagge kaṅkheyya, tiṇakaṭṭhavanappatīnaṃ nāme kaṅkheyyāti, atthi arahato kaṅkhāti?

kv2.3:30.3.pli: Arahā sotāpattiphale vā sakadāgāmiphale vā anāgāmiphale vā arahatte vā kaṅkheyyāti?
